Column.Name: DepositId
Column.Description: Gets or sets the row's unique ID.

Column.Name: Date
Column.Description: Gets or sets the date of the deposit.

Column.Name: Number
Column.Description: Gets or sets the number of the deposit.

Column.Name: Account
Column.Description: Gets or sets the account of the deposit.

Column.Name: Amount
Column.Description: Gets the total value of the payments in the deposit.

Column.Name: Count
Column.Description: Gets the number of payments in the deposit.

Column.Name: Id
Column.Description: Gets or sets the row's unique ID.

Column.Name: YKID
Column.Description: Gets or sets the YKID of the master directory.

Column.Name: LastName
Column.Description: Gets or sets the last name of the master directory.

Column.Name: HisName
Column.Description: Gets or sets the his name of the master directory.

Column.Name: HerName
Column.Description: Gets or sets the her name of the master directory.

Column.Name: FullName
Column.Description: Gets or sets the full name of the master directory.

Column.Name: Address
Column.Description: Gets or sets the address of the master directory.

Column.Name: City
Column.Description: Gets or sets the city of the master directory.

Column.Name: State
Column.Description: Gets or sets the state of the master directory.

Column.Name: Zip
Column.Description: Gets or sets the zip of the master directory.

Column.Name: Phone
Column.Description: Gets or sets the phone of the master directory.

Column.Name: Source
Column.Description: Gets or sets the source of the master directory.

Column.Name: Salutation
Column.Description: Gets or sets a salutation to use for the person. This is the full name without any first names.

Column.Name: PledgeId
Column.Description: Gets or sets the row's unique ID.

Column.Name: Person
Column.Description: Gets or sets the person who made the pledge.

Column.Name: Date
Column.Description: Gets or sets the date of the pledge.

Column.Name: Type
Column.Description: Gets or sets the type of the pledge.

Column.Name: SubType
Column.Description: Gets or sets the sub type of the pledge.

Column.Name: Account
Column.Description: Gets or sets the account of the pledge.

Column.Name: Amount
Column.Description: Gets or sets the amount of the pledge.

Column.Name: Note
Column.Description: Gets or sets the note of the pledge.

Column.Name: Comments
Column.Description: Gets or sets the comments of the pledge.

Column.Name: Modified
Column.Description: Gets or sets the modified of the pledge.

Column.Name: Modifier
Column.Description: Gets or sets the modifier of the pledge.

Column.Name: ExternalSource
Column.Description: Gets or sets the external source of the pledge.

Column.Name: ExternalId
Column.Description: Gets or sets the external id of the pledge.

Column.Name: PaymentId
Column.Description: Gets or sets the row's unique ID.

Column.Name: Person
Column.Description: Gets or sets the person who made the payment.

Column.Name: Date
Column.Description: Gets or sets the date of the payment.

Column.Name: Method
Column.Description: Gets or sets the method of the payment.

Column.Name: CheckNumber
Column.Description: Gets or sets the check number of the payment.

Column.Name: Account
Column.Description: Gets or sets the account of the payment.

Column.Name: Amount
Column.Description: Gets or sets the amount of the payment.

Column.Name: Deposit
Column.Description: Gets or sets the deposit of the payment.
Column.ForeignRelationPropertyDescription: Gets the payments in the deposit.

Column.Name: Comments
Column.Description: Gets or sets the comments of the payment.

Column.Name: Modified
Column.Description: Gets or sets the modified of the payment.

Column.Name: Modifier
Column.Description: Gets or sets the modifier of the payment.

Column.Name: ExternalSource
Column.Description: Gets or sets the external source of the payment.

Column.Name: ExternalId
Column.Description: Gets or sets the external id of the payment.

Schema.Name: SeatingReservations
Schema.RowClassDescription: Describes a ימים נוראים seating reservation.

Column.Name: Id
Column.Description: Gets or sets the row's unique ID.

Column.Name: Pledge
Column.Description: Gets or sets the pledge associated with this reservation.
Column.ForeignRelationPropertyDescription: Gets the seating reservations associated with the pledge.

Column.Name: MensSeats
Column.Description: Gets or sets the mens seats of the seating reservation.

Column.Name: WomensSeats
Column.Description: Gets or sets the womens seats of the seating reservation.

Column.Name: BoysSeats
Column.Description: Gets or sets the boys seats of the seating reservation.

Column.Name: GirlsSeats
Column.Description: Gets or sets the girls seats of the seating reservation.

Column.Name: Notes
Column.Description: Gets or sets the notes of the seating reservation.

Schema.Name: EmailAddresses
Schema.RowClassDescription: Describes a subscriber to the email list.

Column.Name: Name
Column.Description: Gets or sets the display name associated with the email address.

Column.Name: Email
Column.Description: Gets or sets the email address of the subscriber.

Column.Name: RandomCode
Column.Description: Gets or sets a random string unique to this address.

Column.Name: Active
Column.Description: Gets or sets whether the Shul's emails will be sent to this address.

Column.Name: DateAdded
Column.Description: Gets or sets the date that the subscriber joined the list.

Column.Name: UseHtml
Column.Description: Gets or sets the whether the subscriber should receive HTML emails. Not currently used.

Column.Name: Person
Column.Description: Gets or sets the person that uses the email address.

Column.Name: RowId
Column.Description: Gets or sets the row's unique ID.

Schema.Name: StatementLog
Schema.RowClassDescription: Describes a statement sent to a person.

Column.Name: Id
Column.Description: Gets or sets the row's unique ID.

Column.Name: Person
Column.Description: Gets or sets the person who received the statement.
Column.ForeignRelationPropertyDescription: Gets the statements sent to the person.

Column.Name: DateGenerated
Column.Description: Gets or sets the date generated of the statement log.

Column.Name: Media
Column.Description: Gets or sets the media of the statement log.

Column.Name: StatementKind
Column.Description: Gets or sets the statement kind of the statement log.

Column.Name: StartDate
Column.Description: Gets or sets the start date of the statement log.

Column.Name: EndDate
Column.Description: Gets or sets the end date of the statement log.

Column.Name: UserName
Column.Description: Gets or sets the user name of the statement log.

Schema.Name: Ads
Schema.RowClassDescription: Describes an ad in the journal.

Column.Name: AdId
Column.Description: Gets or sets the ad id of the ad.

Column.Name: Year
Column.Description: Gets or sets the year of the journal containing the ad.

Column.Name: DateAdded
Column.Description: Gets or sets the date that the ad was entered.

Column.Name: AdType
Column.Description: Gets or sets the ad type.

Column.Name: ExternalId
Column.Description: Gets or sets an external identifier for the ad. This field links ads to pledges and payments

Column.Name: Comments
Column.Description: Gets or sets comments regarding the ad.

Schema.Name: SeatReservations
Schema.RowClassDescription: Describes a seating reservation for the Melave Malka.

Column.Name: RowId
Column.Description: Gets or sets the row id of the seat reservation.

Column.Name: Person
Column.Description: Gets or sets the person that reserved the seat.
Column.ForeignRelationPropertyDescription: Gets the person's Melave Malka seats.

Column.Name: DateAdded
Column.Description: Gets or sets the date added of the seat reservation.

Column.Name: Year
Column.Description: Gets or sets the year of the seat reservation.

Column.Name: MensSeats
Column.Description: Gets or sets the mens seats of the seat reservation.

Column.Name: WomensSeats
Column.Description: Gets or sets the womens seats of the seat reservation.

Column.Name: RowId
Column.Description: Gets or sets the row id of the melave malka info.

Column.Name: Year
Column.Description: Gets or sets the year of the Melave Malka.

Column.Name: AdDeadline
Column.Description: Gets or sets the stated deadline for receiving ads.

Column.Name: MelaveMalkaDate
Column.Description: Gets or sets the date that the Melave Malka takes place.

Column.Name: Honoree
Column.Description: Gets or sets the guest of honor.
Column.ForeignRelationPropertyDescription: Gets the Melave Malkas that the person has been honored by.

Column.Name: Speaker
Column.Description: Gets or sets the speaker of the melave malka info.

Column.Name: HonoreeTitle
Column.Description: Gets or sets the title of the primary honoree.

Column.Name: Honoree2
Column.Description: Gets or sets the second honoree.
Column.ForeignRelationPropertyDescription: Gets the Melave Malkas that the person has been secondarily honored by.

Column.Name: Honoree2Title
Column.Description: Gets or sets the title of the secondary honoree.

Schema.Name: Callers
Schema.RowClassDescription: Describes a person who will make phone calls asking for ads.

Column.Name: RowId
Column.Description: Gets or sets the row id of the caller.

Column.Name: Person
Column.Description: Gets or sets the person.

Column.Name: DateAdded
Column.Description: Gets or sets the date added of the caller.

Column.Name: Year
Column.Description: Gets or sets the year of the caller.

Column.Name: EmailAddresses
Column.Description: Gets or sets the email addresses of the caller.

Column.Name: CalleeCount
Column.Description: Gets or sets the number of people assigned to the caller.

Schema.Name: Invitees
Schema.RowClassDescription: Describes a person invited to the Melave Malka.

Column.Name: RowId
Column.Description: Gets or sets the row id of the invitee.

Column.Name: Person
Column.Description: Gets or sets the person invited.
Column.ForeignRelationPropertyDescription: Gets the person's Melave Malka invitations.

Column.Name: Year
Column.Description: Gets or sets the year that the invitation applies to.

Column.Name: Source
Column.Description: Gets or sets the source of the invitation.

Column.Name: DateAdded
Column.Description: Gets or sets the date that the invitation was entered.

Column.Name: ShouldCall
Column.Description: Gets or sets whether the person should be called to ask for an ad

Column.Name: Caller
Column.Description: Gets or sets the caller assigned to this person.
Column.ForeignRelationPropertyDescription: Gets the people that the caller should call.

Column.Name: CallerNote
Column.Description: Gets or sets a note from the person's caller.

Column.Name: AdAmount
Column.Description: Gets or sets the total pledge amount of the person's ads, if any.

Column.Name: ShouldEmail
Column.Description: Gets or sets whether the person should be emailed to ask for an ad.

Column.Name: EmailSubject
Column.Description: Gets or sets the subject of the email to send to the person to ask for an ad.

Column.Name: EmailSource
Column.Description: Gets or sets the HTML source of the email to send to the person to ask for an ad.

Column.Name: EmailAddresses
Column.Description: Gets or sets the person's email addresses.

Schema.Name: ReminderEmailLog
Schema.RowClassDescription: Describes an email sent to an invitee to ask for an ad.

Column.Name: RowId
Column.Description: Gets or sets the row id of the reminder email log.

Column.Name: Recipient
Column.Description: Gets or sets the person who received the email.
Column.ForeignRelationPropertyDescription: Gets the emails sent to the person to ask for an ad.

Column.Name: Date
Column.Description: Gets or sets the date that the email was sent.

Column.Name: EmailSubject
Column.Description: Gets or sets the subject of the email.

Column.Name: EmailSource
Column.Description: Gets or sets the email's HTML source.

Column.Name: RowId
Column.Description: Gets or sets the row id of the raffle ticket.

Column.Name: Person
Column.Description: Gets or sets the person that bought the ticket.
Column.ForeignRelationPropertyDescription: Gets the raffle tickets that the person purchased.

Column.Name: DateAdded
Column.Description: Gets or sets the date added of the raffle ticket.

Column.Name: Year
Column.Description: Gets or sets the year of the raffle.

Column.Name: TicketId
Column.Description: Gets or sets the ticket number.

Column.Name: Paid
Column.Description: Gets or sets whether ticket has been paid for.

Column.Name: Comments
Column.Description: Gets or sets comments regarding the ticket.

Schema.Name: Relatives
Schema.RowClassDescription: Describes a relation between a member and someone else.

Column.Name: RowId
Column.Description: Gets or sets the row id of the relative.

Column.Name: Member
Column.Description: Gets or sets the member of the relative.

Column.Name: Relative
Column.Description: Gets or sets the relative of the relative.
Column.ForeignRelationPropertyDescription: Gets the member(s) that this person is related to.

Column.Name: Relation
Column.Description: Gets or sets the type of relation.

Schema.Name: PledgeLinks
Schema.RowClassDescription: Indicates that a payment was intended to pay for a specific pledge.

Column.Name: LinkId
Column.Description: Gets or sets the link id of the pledge link.

Column.Name: Pledge
Column.Description: Gets or sets the pledge that is being paid off.
Column.ForeignRelationPropertyDescription: Gets the payments that pay for this pledge.

Column.Name: Payment
Column.Description: Gets or sets the payment that this instance describes.
Column.ForeignRelationPropertyDescription: Gets the pledges that this payment is paying for.

Column.Name: Amount
Column.Description: Gets or sets the amount of the payment that covers this pledge.

Schema.Name: ImportedPayments
Schema.RowClassDescription: Links a payment imported from an external source.

Column.Name: ImportedPaymentId
Column.Description: Gets or sets a unique ID for this row.

Column.Name: PaymentId
Column.Description: Gets or sets the payment that was imported.
Column.ForeignRelationPropertyDescription: Gets the source that this payment was imported from, if any.

Column.Name: Source
Column.Description: Gets or sets the source that the payment was imported from.

Column.Name: ExternalId
Column.Description: Gets or sets the payment's ID within the external source. This is an opaque value, and must be unique within the source.

Column.Name: DateImported
Column.Description: Gets or sets the date that the payment was imported on.

Column.Name: ImportingUser
Column.Description: Gets or sets the user that imported the payment.
